full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender (IT) for Accommodation Services in Keflavik, Iceland

# Tender Information
### Solicitation Number
WS4424894297

### Date of Publication
March 12, 2024

### Tender Closing Date and Time
March 27, 2024, 14:00 EDT

### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
April 25, 2024 and May 12, 2024

### Tender Status
Expired

## Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide accommodation services in Keflavik, Iceland for the period of April 24 to May 12, 2024.

## Service Requirement
The hotel(s) must be located within a ten (10) kilometer drive of the Main "Diamond Gate" entrance. 

## Tender Requirements
- Suppliers must provide a comprehensive package of accommodation services that meet the requirements of the DND.
- The tender must include the cost of accommodations, amenities, and services as specified in the solicitation document.
- Bidders are required to submit a detailed proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and resources to be allocated to deliver the services.

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

## Trade Agreements
Canada invites offers from suppliers who can provide the required services under various international trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and others.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarification on the tender requirements, please contact:
Hunter, Martine (SPAC/PSPC)
martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Accessing Tender Documents
Please visit the Ariba Discovery website to access the tender documents and submit your bid.
